episodes.title: Facebook Your Small Business
episodes.author: Facebook Your Small Business
episodes.summary: Facebook Your Small Business Do you have a Small to Medium business and want more Customers? Of Course you do!! Working with a Limited Budget? Of Course you are!! Millions of Business owners worldwide are in the same position. It’s not enough to have a website and just expect customers to go to it and spend money and It’s not enough to think you can just open the doors and the customers will just walk in and make your business a success. Sure it happens, but why leave it up to chance or luck? Today the world revolves around Social Media, or to be more precise Facebook. For instance today I woke up grabbed a coffee and headed to the gym, first thing I do when I walk into the Gym. I check-in to Facebook, meaning I tell the world that I am up, and I am getting healthy. This Facebook thing, has suddenly become a defining element, millions are logging in to Facebook everyday to communicate, socialize and to just fit in. Is today the day you take that 1 step that could mean the difference between driving a Hyundai and a BMW? Is today the day you take that 1 step that could mean the difference between keeping your doors open until the economy turns in your favour? Only you can answer this! However before you try and guess and decide on an answer at least give your business a fighting chance. I am yet to meet a business owner who can’t benefit from the info and techniques on the following page. Here are some of the things that will be covered: • Create Great Facebook Pages or Group For Your Business • Advertise Using Facebook News Feed • Avoid Common (And Costly) Online Advertising Mistakes • Create and Advertise Your Events On Facebook • Create the Facebook Like Button for Your Website All of this plus a lot more!! So head over to FacebookYourSmallBusiness.Com Be Ready, Be Open and most importantly Take Action. You have nothing to lose and everything to gain.
